category: Personnel, management and administration procedures; Operations and service delivery
description: Repository is incapable of meeting service level goals in accordance with its business objectives.
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Define realistic service levels and implement policies and procedures for their review and adjustment
- Secure and allocate resources based on business priorities
- Establish mechanisms to regularly review and if necessary adjust policies and procedures in order to ensure objectives are realised In the event of risk’s execution:
- Undertake appropriate internal enquiries to determine the shortcomings that led to failure and update policies accordingly
name: Loss of performance or service level
notes: - Does repository make a commitment to its stakeholder groups to offer a minimal level of service or performance?
preMitigationNotes: - Repository aims to deliver each object in less than 5 minutes after the request but it consistently takes 10 minutes per object
